author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan and add the beans, chilli flakes and garlic. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and sauté for 2-3 minutes, until the beans are tender. To serve, place into a serving bowl.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  150g/5½oz edamame beans, in their pods,  pinch chilli flakes,  2 garlic cloves, finely chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
